name: Reef Drake
movement: walk 30 ft., burrow 30 ft., swim 60 ft.
description: A massive dragon with dark, scaled skin resembling the colors of the ocean, the Reef Drake possesses an imposing presence and fearsome features, such as sharp teeth and powerful limbs.
memorable: Its ability to create tunnels through coral and solid rock, making it a strategic threat in underwater or coastal environments.
goals: To dominate its territory, potentially ambush intruders, and cause destruction in coastal locations.
relations: May be encountered alongside other sea creatures or as a rival of other drakes.
environment: Typically found in coastal waters, coral reefs, or near underwater cave systems.
strengths: High Strength score allows for devastating melee attacks and significant durability in combat.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence reduces tactical capabilities in battle.
attacks: Delivering a powerful bite attack and two slam attacks, it can unleash a thunderous concussive snap.
most_powerful_ability: Concussive Snap, which emits a shockwave dealing thunder damage in a large cone and pushing back enemies.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, enabling it to sense nearby creatures without sight.
skills: Possesses good perception with a passive score of 12.
additional_information: Double damage to structures makes it especially dangerous in fortified areas.
Can initiate ambush tactics by hiding near coral reefs.
Created tunnels can be strategic for movement and surprise.
Effective as a frontline combatant with strong melee capabilities.
Vulnerable to Intelligence-based effects due to low score.
test_queries: massive sea dragon with thunder attacks
formidable drake that can burrow through coral
aggressive dragon found in coastal waters
creature that deals double damage to structures
powerful underwater monster with ambush tactics
